reasoning: Early gastric cancer (mucosal/submucosal invasion) represents approximately 20-25% of gastric cancer cases globally. Based on global gastric cancer incidence of ~20-22 per 100k, estimated EGC incidence ~5-6 per 100k. Higher in countries with screening programs (Japan, South Korea); much lower in Western populations. Geographic variation is significant.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (gastric cancer); Japanese Gastric Cancer Association epidemiological data
